About Me

I am a 2nd year M.Tech student in RF & Microwave Engineering at IIT Kharagpur, I specialize in designing and optimizing high-frequency circuits, with expertise in RF packaging, advanced electromagnetics, antenna theory, and VLSI interconnects. My research involves utilizing simulation tools like HFSS and ADS to tackle complex design challenges in modern RF systems. This platform showcases my academic projects, technical reports, and design insights developed during my postgraduateÂ studies.
